SCENEMESSAGE.Settings.GlobalChatHint: Stop sorting chat messages by scene (default foundry behavior).
SCENEMESSAGE.Settings.InheritanceHint: Allow messages to be sorted via inherited scene IDs (see the API section of the readme).
SCENEMESSAGE.Settings.SortOocHint: Mark and sort out of character messages by scene (will not apply to messages made without this setting enabled).
